com.bfg.cart
Class Promotion

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.bfg.cart.Promotion
public class Promotion
extends java.lang.Object

Promotion is used to implement the Gift With Purchase promotion used by the Books for Geeks Web Site. It looks for items in the cart which match the target condition, either by specific product or by category. If the target condition is met, a gift is placed in the cart with the promotionItem flag set, which causes it not to be charged for.

Copyright 2002, James M. Turner No warranty is made as to the fitness of this code for any particular purpose. It is included for demonstration purposes only.

Author:
James M. Turner

Constructor Detail

Promotion

public Promotion()
Method Detail

getPromoName

public java.lang.String getPromoName()
Returns the human-readable name of the promotion
Returns:
The name of the promotion.

isCategoryPromotion

public boolean isCategoryPromotion()
Returns true if this promotion applies to a category rather than an individual product.
Returns:
true if the promotion is applied to a category, false if it is applied to a single product.

getTargetItem

public Product getTargetItem()
Returns the product which must be purchased in order to receive the free gift. Only used by promotions which do not have isCategoryPromotion set to true.
Returns:
The product which satisfies the requirement for this promotion.

getTargetCategory

public Category getTargetCategory()
Returns the category which must be purchased in order to receive the free gift. Only used by promotions which have isCategoryPromotion set to true.
Returns:
The category which satisfies the requirement for this promotion.

getGiftItem

public Product getGiftItem()
Returns the product which is received if the conditions for the promotion are met.
Returns:
The product which will be received as a gift for this promotion.

getQuantityRequired

public int getQuantityRequired()
Returns the number of the target item that must be purchased in order to receive the gift. Note that for category promotions, this is the number in aggregate from all items that are in the category.
Returns:
The number of target items required to receive the gift.

getPromotions

public static java.util.Vector getPromotions()
Returns the list of promotions currently available. If the promotion list has previously been loaded from the database, it returns a cached copy, otherwise it calls loadPromotions to get the promotions from the database and stores them to the cache.
Returns:
The promotions to be used on the site.

loadPromotions

public static void loadPromotions()
Connects to the database and retreives the list of promotions. If a promotion is no longer valid because the product or category it references no longer exists, the promotion is ignored.

runPromotions

public static void runPromotions(Cart cart)
Run all of the current promotions over the shopping cart. Before running the promotions, it removes any existing promotional items from the cart so that each run is a fresh one.
Parameters:
cart - The shopping cart to calculate promotions for.

runPromotion

public void runPromotion(Cart cart)
Run this promotion over the shopping cart. If the condition is met, add a promotional item to the cart.
Parameters:
cart - The shopping cart to calculate promotions for.
